articles.title: K Balachander’s 90th birth anniversary: Rajinikanth & Kamal Haasan recall moments with the legendary director - PINKVILLA
articles.description: K Balachander passed away on December 23, 2014. His last onscreen appearance was in Kamal Haasan’s film Uttama Villan, where he played the role of a director.
